ChangeState.description: The ChangeState action is used to disable/Enable any DIMM state.
ChangeState.longDescription: This Action will be performed through HHM Module of BIOS which requires KCS interface between BMC and BIOS. In SPX-13 AST2600EVB setup KCS interface is not available and this action is not validated. Once CRB available for AST2600 this action can be validated.
